item.title: Addons
item.description: 插件 此頁面列出了在 Scratch Addons 上實現的所有插件. 此頁面不完整, 我們需要您的幫助來完成圖像. 閱讀更多這裡 List view In this page, an easter egg addon will have an egg symbol besides its name.' data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="left" data-html="true"Easter egg 2D color picker 2d-color-picker Replaces saturation and brightness sliders in the costume editor with a 2D color picker. Hold Shift while dragging the cursor to change the values on a single axis.
